name: Weekly Performance Review
prompt: Weekly performance review. Use botcore CLI to: 1) `botcore get_paper_performance` for overall stats. 2) `botcore get_tuning_dashboard` for tuning analysis. 3) `botcore get_adjustment_history '{{"limit":20}}'` for this week's changes. 4) `botcore get_paper_strategy_settings` for strategy breakdown. Create detailed report: weekly PnL, win rate, strategy comparison, adjustments made this week and impact, AI suggestions, action items for next week. For YELLOW-tier improvements, present as confirmable proposals. IMPORTANT: After generating the report, send it to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification '{{"message":"\ud83d\udcc8 Weekly Review:\n<your detailed report>"}}'`. Do NOT skip this step.
